Key Match Events: Nathan Eovaldi struck out 10 and held the Chicago White Sox to one hit and two walks over seven innings
Corey Seager's solo homer in the fourth gave Texas a 1-0 lead
Wyatt Langford's RBI groundout in the seventh added a run for Texas
Miscellaneous Highlights: Texas swept the season series against Chicago, 7-0
The Rangers' four-game sweep of the White Sox on July 25 is the last time the club won three consecutive games until Thursday
Others: The Rangers open a weekend series against the Oakland Athletics with right-hander Jon Gray (5-5, 4.32) facing left-hander JP Sears (10-9, 4.35) at 7:10 p.m. Friday at Globe Life Field
